author: feedback@businessinsider.com (Melissa Wiley), Melissa Wiley
title: Zoom, TikTok dances, and sourdough bread: How coronavirus self-isolation has changed American society in just a few weeks
description: TikTok On March 19, California became the first US state to issue a stay-at-home order to curb the spread of the coronavirus. Since then, 42 states have issued stay-at-home orders, affecting an estimated 95% of Americans. Social distancing has radically chang…
